1370: Ebram was born in Breestraat in 1370.
Got married to Saswe at age 21 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Saswe, Ebram, at age 22.
1372: Had a daughter with Saswe, Ryccie, at age 23.
1373: Had a son with Saswe, Salomon, at age 24.
1375: Had a son with Saswe, Gherelm, at age 26.
1376: Had a son with Saswe, Rolekine, at age 27.
1377: Had a daughter with Saswe, Clementia, at age 28.
1378: Had a son with Saswe, Iacobus, at age 29.
1379: Lost son Salomon when Salomon was 7 years old.
1381: Had a son with Saswe, Hille, at age 32.
